rules.name: businessTrip
conditions: hotel AND business

endpoints.name: Prinsenhof Hotel
endpoints.description: Angel recommends you this 4-star boutique hotel in the heart of Groningen. Right in the shadows of the Martini Tower, its beautiful garden will offer the best cultural experience, suitable for any purpose, especially for a romantic experience <3
conditions: hotel AND (business OR leisure) AND (cultural OR private OR romantic OR area_citycenter) AND NOT cheap

endpoints.name: NH Hotel de Ville, Mercure, The Student Hotel
endpoints.description: According to your requirements, Angel has found several suitable places. Opt for The Student Hotel or for the NH Hotel de Ville, if you'd like to be close to the city center or for Mercure for a more isolated option
conditions: hotel AND (business OR leisure) AND (service_breakfast_included AND bar)

endpoints.name: Klipper Zwadde Boat Hotel
endpoints.description: Staying in a boat hotel! I bet you've never thought about that, huh? Angel highly suggests this for a unique experience ;)
conditions: hotel AND  leisure AND cultural AND average

endpoints.name: Martini Hotel Groningen
endpoints.description: Wonderful memories are granted if you stay here, the sweet spot of Groningen
conditions: hotel AND (business OR leisure) AND (cultural_experience OR private OR romantic OR area_citycenter) AND cheap

endpoints.name: Hotel Miss Blanche
endpoints.description: The best option for you, my friend, would be this boutique hotel in the city of Groningen with luxurious and uniquely furnished rooms
conditions: hotel AND (business OR leisure) AND area_citycenter AND fine AND (romantic OR family)

endpoints.name: The Student Hotel
endpoints.description: This is the best option for you, with everything you need + the chance of extending your stay for up to a couple of months at a good price.
conditions: hotel AND (business OR leisure) AND (service_long_stay AND (area_citycenter OR service_breakfast_included OR bar))

endpoints.name: Stee in stad
endpoints.description: This is a great place for staying in with your family, a perfect location since you're close to the city center and the area is quiet and nice, all at the best price
conditions: hotel AND leisure AND family AND average AND service_breakfast_included OR area_korrewegwijk

endpoints.name: City Hotel
endpoints.description: This is a great place for you and your family if you want to stay in the city center at the best price
conditions: hotel AND leisure AND area_citycenter AND average AND service_breakfast_included AND family

endpoints.name: Mercure
endpoints.description: This hotel has all the facilities you could probably wish for, all in an isolated environment, reasonably far away from the city center crowdedness
conditions: hotel AND (business OR leisure) AND (area_rivierenbuurt OR service_breakfast_included)

endpoints.name: Bed & Breakfast 'Het Kasteeltje'
endpoints.description: I know you're on a budget, but trust me, this place will make your family feel like you've had the best vacation ever! Cosy rooms, your own kitchen and a friendly neighbourhood, what else is there to wish for?
conditions: hotel AND leisure AND (area_oosterportbuurt OR (family AND cheap))

endpoints.name: Mr Mofongo
endpoints.description: Mr. Mofongo has seven different 'worlds', each with its own atmosphere and culinary experience. In addition to quality, every world guarantees innovation, sustainability and above all experience. Let yourself be carried away by Máximo's endless wanderlust and join him on an adventure!
conditions: restaurant AND (business OR leisure) AND (romantic OR bar OR gang) AND (average OR expensive)  AND (dinner OR lunch)

endpoints.name: Mr Smith's
endpoints.description: Welcome to the jungle! Tropical cocktails just for you!
conditions: restaurant AND (business OR leisure) AND (romantic OR bar) AND (lang_thai OR lang_dutch) AND average  AND (dinner OR lunch)

endpoints.name: Bronco
endpoints.description: The best RibHouse in Groningen
conditions: restaurant AND leisure  AND average  AND (gang OR bar) AND region_american AND lang_US AND (dinner OR lunch)

endpoints.name: De Betere Tijden
endpoints.description: They are renowned for their surprise menu, consisting of 3, 4 or 5 courses. Of course, your preferences are taken into account.
conditions: restaurant AND (business OR leisure) AND romantic AND average  AND region_european AND lang_dutch AND (dinner OR lunch)

endpoints.name: De Kleine Heerlijkheid
endpoints.description: “We” are Elbrich & Zaneta, friends and now also business partners. We took over De Kleine Heerlijkheid at the end of 2013 with the idea of ​​creating a place here where people feel at home, are pampered and very tasty food. Our restaurant is located just outside the city center on the Schuitendiep in Groningen in a beautiful building from the beginning of the 17th century. The building has been inhabited for years, a family in every room, and that homely atmosphere has remained. The restaurant can rightly be called a living room restaurant.
conditions: restaurant AND (business OR leisure) AND romantic AND average  AND region_european AND lang_dutch AND (dinner OR lunch)

endpoints.name: Cho Fah
endpoints.description: Very good and authentic Thai food. Nice restaurant and friendly service.
conditions: restaurant AND (business OR leisure) AND average  AND region_asian AND lang_thai AND cultural AND (dinner OR lunch)

endpoints.name: Gustatio
endpoints.description: Angel's Favorite! The owners of this casual osteria want to bring traditional Italian cuisine to the fore. No complicated combinations here, but homemade pasta and powerful flavors that will take your taste buds on a journey. Delicious authenticity cuisine.
conditions: restaurant AND (business OR leisure) AND romantic AND average  AND region_european AND lang_italian AND (dinner OR lunch)

endpoints.name: Da Vinci
endpoints.description: Homemade Italian food, by the water.
conditions: restaurant AND (business OR leisure) AND (romantic OR cultural) AND average AND region_european AND lang_italian AND (dinner OR lunch)

endpoints.name: Ouzerie De Olijfboom
endpoints.description: Taste traditional food from the best Greek restaurant in Groningen!
conditions: restaurant AND (business OR leisure) AND gang AND average  AND region_european AND lang_greek AND (dinner OR lunch)

endpoints.name: Thai Jasmine
endpoints.description: The BEST Thai food Angel ever had!
conditions: restaurant AND (business OR leisure) AND cheap AND gang AND region_asian AND lang_thai AND (dinner OR lunch)

endpoints.name: Imono
endpoints.description: Perfect for a first sushi date!
conditions: restaurant AND (business OR leisure) AND romantic AND (average OR expensive) AND region_asian AND lang_japanese AND dinner

endpoints.name: Hanasato
endpoints.description: Want to impress your date with fine Asian cuisine? This is the place!
conditions: restaurant AND romantic AND expensive  AND region_asian AND lang_japanese AND dinner

endpoints.name: De Pijp Wine & Dine
endpoints.description: For a romantic evening and great top class food, this is a must not miss! Known as one of the best suprise menu restaurants in Groningen!
conditions: restaurant AND romantic AND expensive  AND region_european AND lang_french AND dinner

endpoints.name: Vive la Vie
endpoints.description: The best restaurant in Groningen without a doubt! Celebrating something special? Get your taste buds ready for an unforgettable experience!
conditions: restaurant AND romantic AND expensive  AND region_european AND(lang_dutch OR lang_french) AND dinner

endpoints.name: Voila
endpoints.description: Bringing the French cuisine to you in Groningen! A 5 course suprise menu accompanied by 5 different glasses of wine, leaving you amazed by the end of the night!
conditions: restaurant AND romantic AND expensive  AND region_european AND (lang_dutch OR lang_french) AND dinner

endpoints.name: Restaurant Nassau
endpoints.description: In the Prinsenhof Hotel! Nassau's kitchen is run by executive chef Christian de Vries. Nassau is innovative and receives praising reviews in the Michelin and Lekker guides.
conditions: restaurant AND romantic AND fine AND (lang_dutch OR lang_french) AND dinner AND cultural

endpoints.name: Konbu Streetfood
endpoints.description: Affordable bites for all, that will keep you going back for more!
conditions: restaurant AND romantic AND cheap  AND region_asian AND lang_vietnamese AND (dinner OR lunch)

endpoints.name: Tian Tian Le
endpoints.description: Want to feel relaxed and zen? This is a must not miss, especially for the food!
conditions: restaurant AND (gang OR family) AND cheap  AND (region_asian AND lang_chinese OR region_american AND lang_chilean ) AND (dinner OR lunch)

endpoints.name: Chaplin's Pub
endpoints.description: Just the place for you to grab a beer with the boys!
conditions: restaurant AND (gang OR bar) AND cheap  AND region_american AND lang_us AND (dinner OR lunch)

endpoints.name: Magoya
endpoints.description: Beautiful Sakura decorations and delicious asian dishes, the best place to be aesthetically pleased and gastronomically fulfilled
conditions: restaurant AND (gang OR romantic OR family) AND (cheap OR average)  AND region_asian AND lang_japanese AND (dinner OR lunch)

endpoints.name: De Pasta Fabriek
endpoints.description: Angel's favorite Diavolo Pasta! Help yourself restaurant, chill vibe!
conditions: restaurant AND (business OR leisure) AND (gang OR family) AND cheap  AND lang_italian AND (dinner OR lunch)

endpoints.name: Vapiano
endpoints.description: It seems like Vapiano is the best place for you, here you'll find an excellent meal for a low price. On top of that, it's vegan/vegetarian friendly ;)
conditions: restaurant AND (business OR leisure) AND gang AND cheap  AND (vegan OR vegetarian OR lang_italian) AND (dinner OR lunch)

endpoints.name: Starbucks
endpoints.description: In need for a study place while combining it with a chat with your friend? Here you go, the best coffee right in the building of the University library, what else can one wish for?
conditions: cafe AND (leisure AND (gang OR studying) OR business)  AND (average OR expensive) AND coffee AND (breakfast OR lunch)

endpoints.name: Doppio Espresso
endpoints.description: This is the place to be if you'd like to have a cup of refreshing coffee with your friends.
conditions: cafe AND leisure AND gang AND (cheap OR average) AND coffee AND (breakfast OR lunch)

endpoints.name: Coffee Company
endpoints.description: This is the perfect place to serve a coffee in a relaxed and cozy atmosphere, be it for studying, going out with your friends or family.
conditions: cafe AND leisure AND (gang OR family OR studying) AND (cheap OR average) AND coffee AND (breakfast OR lunch)

endpoints.name: Black & Bloom
endpoints.description: Experiment with white and black coffee at Black & Bloom, once here you'll want to come back again
conditions: cafe AND leisure  AND gang AND (cheap OR average)  AND coffee AND (breakfast OR lunch)

endpoints.name: Chocolate Company
endpoints.description: Your sweet tooth thirves for some chocolate? This is where you want to be ;)
conditions: cafe AND leisure AND gang AND (cheap OR average) AND hot_chocolate AND (breakfast OR lunch)

endpoints.name: Smooth Brothers
endpoints.description: The perfect place if you feel in a jazzy mood and want to delight yourself with a smoothy among other
conditions: cafe AND leisure AND (gang AND cheap OR cheap OR average)  AND smoothies AND (breakfast OR lunch)

questions.name: What is your main goal?
conditions: hotel OR cafe OR restaurant

questions.name: How much are you willing to spend?
conditions: goal

questions.name: What do you have in mind?
conditions: money
NOT business
NOT business AND NOT cafe
NOT business AND NOT cafe
NOT business

questions.name: What kind of meal would you like?
conditions: cafe OR restaurant
NOT restaurant
NOT cafe

questions.name: What type of cuisine are you looking for?
conditions: meal AND NOT cafe

questions.name: You have chosen American cuisine
conditions: region_american

questions.name: You have chosen European cuisine
conditions: region_european

questions.name: You have chosen Asian cuisine
conditions: region_asian

questions.name: Do you have any dietary restrictions?
conditions: meal AND NOT cafe

questions.name: What service preference do you have?
conditions: money AND NOT isBusinessTrip AND NOT (cafe OR restaurant)

options.description: Long stay (up to a couple of months)

questions.name: You chose Cafes
conditions: cafe

questions.name: You're on a business trip
questions.description: please tell us what are your preferences
conditions: isBusinessTrip

questions.name: What area would you prefer?
conditions: service AND NOT cafe AND NOT restaurant
